name: Nostris Diebus
description:
Controls
  • A and D - move left and right
  • Spacebar - rocket boots!
  • Left click - swing mining pick
  • Left shift - dodge roll
Story

Callum is a 20-year-old space miner, abandoned during one of SpaceMineCo’s speculative excursions. SpaceMineCo had been exploring the mineral-rich microworlds built around the mysterious Tempus Anulus black hole, but they found that each microworld was inhabited by viscous and vicious slime monsters. The SpaceMineCo ship left in a hurry, barely scraping away after being rushed by a particularly nasty horde of slimes, leaving Callum behind to fend for himself.

Now Callum must find a way home to his beautiful wife, traveling from microworld to microworld. Mind the mysterious black hole!

Credits
  • Programming & Protagonist: Callum
  • Art: TheAtrxcity
  • UI: Serlecu
  • Production & Design: Lfnt
Assets
  • Theme music: by Kim Lightning at Pixabay
  • Game Over music: by Kim Lightning at Pixabay
  • SFX: by SwishSwoosh on Unity Asset Store 
  • SFX: mk.matheusklein on Unity Asset Store
